Shannon Sanctions by Endpoint Domain and Error Type

targets.expr:
(
  sum by(service_id) (increase(path_shannon_relays_total{container="path-shannon-mainnet", success="true"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
  or
  (sum by(service_id) (increase(path_shannon_relays_total{container="path-shannon-mainnet"}[$__rate_interval])) * 0)
) 
/ 
sum by(service_id) (increase(path_shannon_relays_total{container="path-shannon-mainnet"}[$__rate_interval]))

targets.legendFormat: Fallback Endpoint Usage (%) for all services

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "No session endpoints available: using fallback endpoints"
| fields log.service

panels.title: Shannon Fallback Logs - All Endpoints Sanctioned

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "Sending all traffic to fallback"
| stats by (log.service) count() as service_count
| sort by (service_count) desc

panels.title: Shannon Logs - All Traffic using Fallback

panels.description: For each service_id, calculate the percentage of relays on the Shannon mainnet that used a fallback in the past 5 minutes.
panels.title: Shannon Fallback Usage (%) by Service

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "Timed out waiting for Pocket Network to respond. Using a fallback endpoint."
| stats by (log.service_id) count() as timeout_count
| sort by (timeout_count) desc

panels.title: Fallback Usage Due to Timeout During Session Rollover

panels.description: For each service_id, show the per-second rate (averaged over 5 minutes) of relays on the Shannon mainnet that used a fallback.
panels.title: Shannon RPS Fallback Usage by Service

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "Got a response from Pocket Network, but it contained an error. Using a fallback endpoint instead"
| stats by (log.service_id) count() as endpoint_error_count
| sort by (endpoint_error_count) desc

panels.title: Fallback Usage Due to Endpoint Error During Session Rollover

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "Unrecognized relay error type"
| stats by (log.error, log.service_id) count() as count
| sort by (count) desc

panels.title: Shannon Sanctions by Domain and Reason

targets.expr:
kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND "HTTP request failed"
| stats by (log.error, log.http_client_debug_url) count() as count
| sort by (count) desc

kubernetes.pod_namespace: "middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name: "path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND kubernetes.node_labels.failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/region:="us-east4"
AND log.service_id:="xrplevm"
AND "SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN"
| fields log.error, log.service_id

panels.title: Ratelimit over limit by envoy backend
Top Chains by Non-2XX Responses: Total Requests

targets.expr:
# Percentage of non-2xx responses out of total requests for each chain
topk(10,
  (
    sum by(chain_id) (
      label_replace(
        sum by(envoy_cluster_name) (
          increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{envoy_cluster_name=~"httproute/middleware/.*", envoy_response_code!~"2.."}[$__range])
        ),
        "chain_id", 
        "$1", 
        "envoy_cluster_name", 
        "httproute/middleware/([^-]+).*"
      )
    )
    /
    sum by(chain_id) (
      label_replace(
        sum by(envoy_cluster_name) (
          increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{envoy_cluster_name=~"httproute/middleware/.*"}[$__range])
        ),
        "chain_id", 
        "$1", 
        "envoy_cluster_name", 
        "httproute/middleware/([^-]+).*"
      )
    )
  ) * 100
)

kubernetes.pod_namespace:="middleware" 
AND kubernetes.container_name:="path-shannon-mainnet" 
AND kubernetes.node_labels.failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/region:="us-east4"

| sort by (occurrences) desc
